verses.roman:
tasmād bṛhadrathas tasya
mahāvīryaḥ sudhṛt-pitā
sudhṛter dhṛṣṭaketur vai
haryaśvo 'tha marus tataḥ

synonyms: tasmāt—from Devarāta; bṛhadrathaḥ—a son named Bṛhadratha; tasya—of him (Bṛhadratha); mahāvīryaḥ—a son named Mahāvīrya; sudhṛt-pitā—he became the father of King Sudhṛti; sudhṛteḥ—from Sudhṛti; dhṛṣṭaketuḥ—a son named Dhṛṣṭaketu; vai—indeed; haryaśvaḥ—his son was Haryaśva; atha—thereafter; maruḥ—Maru; tataḥ—thereafter.
translation: From Devarāta came a son named Bṛhadratha and from Bṛhadratha a son named Mahāvīrya, who became the father of Sudhṛti. The son of Sudhṛti was known as Dhṛṣṭaketu, and from Dhṛṣṭaketu came Haryaśva. From Haryaśva came a son named Maru.
